summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the "Planned Variations" Program of the Model Cities Program of The City of Seattle; authorizing the Director of the City-Wide Model Cities Program to implement said Planned Variations Program; establishing new and additional positions and abrogating certain positions in the Executive Department - Model Cities Office and increasing certain allocations and establishing certain new allocations in the 1972 Budget of said Office in connection therewith and making an appropriation from the Model Cities Fund therefor.
